about_agency.Service Areas: Jumeirah, Za'abeel, Deira, Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT), Dubailand, Business Bay, Dubai Sports City, Al Barari, Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai Creek Harbour, Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT), Mohammed Bin Rashid City, Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), Dubai Studio City, Downtown Dubai, DAMAC Hills 2 (Akoya by DAMAC), Tilal Al Ghaf, The Views, DAMAC Lagoons, Arabian Ranches 3, Town Square See less areas
about_agency.Description: 7 States Real Estate Dubai is a leading real estate company specializing in property sales, rentals, and management in the vibrant city of Dubai. With an unwavering commitment to excellence and a deep understanding of the local market, 7 States Real Estate has established itself as a trusted and reliable partner for individuals and businesses seeking exceptional real estate solutions. With a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals, 7 States Real Estate offers a comprehensive range of services to meet the diverse needs of its clients. Whether it's finding the perfect residential property, securing a profitable investment opportunity, or managing a property portfolio, the company leverages its extensive network and industry expertise to deliver outstanding results. At 7 States Real Estate, customer satisfaction is at the core of everything they do. They prioritize understanding their clients' unique requirements and provide tailored solutions to exceed their expectations. With a deep knowledge of Dubai's dynamic property market, they guide clients through every step of the buying, selling, or renting process, ensuring a seamless and transparent experience. The company's portfolio showcases an impressive selection of properties across Dubai, including luxurious villas, stylish apartments, and prime commercial spaces. Whether clients are looking for a prestigious address in Downtown Dubai, a serene waterfront property in Dubai Marina, or a bustling retail space in Business Bay, Seven States Real Estate has a wide array of options to suit every taste and budget. Moreover, 7 States Real Estate's property management division is dedicated to providing top-notch services to property owners, ensuring hassle-free operations and maximizing returns on investments. From tenant screening and lease management to maintenance and repairs, the company's expert team handles every aspect of property management with utmost professionalism and efficiency. With a reputation built on integrity, transparency, and professionalism, 7 States Real Estate Dubai is the go-to choice for individuals and businesses seeking exceptional real estate services in Dubai. Their unwavering commitment to excellence, combined with their in-depth market knowledge and personalized approach, sets them apart as a trusted partner in the dynamic and ever-evolving Dubai real estate landscape. Read less

about_agent.Specialities: Residential Sales, Residential Leasing, Commercial Sales, Commercial Leasing, Off-Plan Sales
about_agent.Description: Meet Ayoub Omar, the visionary founder behind 7 States Real Estate, a Dubai-based firm specializing in client real estate portfolio management. Ayoub's journey began in 2019 when he transitioned from a successful career in international banking, where he excelled as a relationship manager in wealth management. Drawing from his financial expertise, Ayoub reimagined real estate as a pathway to fulfilling his clients' financial aspirations. His fusion of financial insights and a passion for design set him apart, allowing him to craft tailored solutions that prioritize individualized real estate portfolio needs. Ayoub's reputation is built on a foundation of integrity, transparency, and a deep-seated commitment to nurturing enduring client relationships. His trajectory showcases his adaptability and innovative mindset, making him a trusted partner in Dubai's dynamic real estate landscape. At 7 States Real Estate, Ayoub Omar continues to pioneer a client-centric approach that reshapes the way real estate portfolio management is perceived, solidifying his position as a trailblazer in the industry. Read less

about_agency.Description: 5 Stars Real Estate Brokerage is one of the leading real estate companies in the country and is rapidly expanding its presence in the region; in terms of services with high professionalism and credibility in order to provide an innovative way to satisfy the needs of our clients, who are also our partners. We are not bound into traditional real estate strategy when it comes to selling, renting, or buying but instead, 5 Stars Real Estate focuses entirely on how to satisfy our partners’ needs and wants. Our MISSION is to look for a new solution and to deliver outstanding service to cater to the desire of our partners in which is our personal goal. Our VISION is to be the top choice for all who are planning to invest in real estate while we continue the effectiveness we are currently giving to our partners. Read less

about_agent.Description: I brings four years of experience in real estate, excellent customer service and a commitment to work hard, listen and follow through. I provide quality service to build relationships with clients and more importantly, maintain those relationships by communicating effectively. My success is based almost exclusively on positive referrals. I earns the respect of his clients by working tirelessly on their behalf and by always offering them candid advice. Read less
